content.p: You can pay the Â£15 replacement fee through the online store. If you have a crime number please email universitycard@nottingham.ac.uk so we can issue one free of charge. Please include your full name, ID number and crime number. Please take the card to the Security office, at the rear of Hallward Library (Mon-Fri 8:00-15:45) and we can check it and issue a new one if need be. Your student card has been printed and can now be collected from your home Student Service Centre. Please also remember that if your card has been lost or stolen it is your responsibility under the implied terms and conditions of university card use that you report your card as lost or stolen to the university card office by emailing universitycard@nottingham.ac.uk immediately. This will ensure that your lost or stolen card can be blocked, preventing unauthorised use. The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
